We told everyone we had decided the baby name a long time ago and loved it It was decided and wasnt going to change by the time we told them We say her name multiple times a day even though she isnt born yet Her name is Avila 
Mother in Law immediately says thats pretty it is a Spanish surname though Then Brother in Law says That is not a great name its a Spanish surname and the last name of a man one of my girlfriends cheated with He is the most against it and very vocal I have learned my lesson I will not be telling the name before the birth in the future I dont understand how telling everyone that youve decided and fallen in love with a name should be followed up with Thats not a great name We are religious so St Teresa of Avila is important to us and a defining highlight of the name Now it feels like husbands family is going to conspire against it This would only even be a minor issue if we lived out west in New Mexico where husband is from Funny enough my husband didnt even know it was a surname but his brother and mother did Grandma in law loves the name fortunately and shes lived in New Mexico her whole life I feel like the excitement I had for the name is being stepped on and Im very sad when this is a happy time for us
Everyone knows preparing for a baby is expensive but what we did for our first  years ago doesnt seem to be options again so looking for other peoples money saving tips

I am the proud and eternally grateful mom to my darling  month year old son I never really thought Id be able to have a baby from my body due to a traumatic history of anorexia nervous and severely low bmi However I was able to gain weight  lbs and  and have a healthy pregnancy and baby  sadly nursing took so much out of me and now Im ashamed to say Im back down to  lbs I so badly want to have another baby but I cant seem to gain weight Idk what Im looking for  hope Advice But just thank you to anyone out there who has something to share

For context I will be  weeks pregnant at the time of the wedding but their maternity dresses have a long delivery time so I have to order now at  weeks pregnant My sizing prepregnancy puts me at a size small  and Im standardly a size  Last pregnancy I only gained belly weight so per the measurements I would still fit size small except the waist The dress Im looking at is empire waist and flowy so Im thinking that waist size wont matter as much and theoretically I should still fit a size small everywhere else  I reached out to them and they recommended sizing  sizes up which puts me at a large size  and that just seems extremely unlikely to fit Id have to size the chest down so much it would be impossible Wondering if I likely could still fit a small based on others experiences Considering a medium as well but would have to order both now and Id be out quite a bit of money from shipping return shipping and restocking fee for ordering a second dress even if I return it Ill do it if I have to but would prefer not to

Hi Im  years old and  weeks today I have been struggling so I guess Im here to just vent  I found out I was pregnant and my partner of  years was happy and got a second job We live far apart from eachother and thats been very hard We want to move in together but I have an apartment with a roommate we dont get along and thats another stress of mine because we were good friends and Im having trouble finding a replacement roommate Im back home with my parents to get awaya break from my roommate as she really really hurt me A few times I feel like I cant move on with anything else until I can get out of my apartment situation Im trying not to beat myself up about it because I had a gut feeling that I shouldnt have moved with this person but I ignored it I wasnt ready to move anyway I just didnt want to inconvenience my friend because I already agreed to it months earlier Most of my money goes towards that apartment and I HATE being there so now I commute to work from my parents house more often which is extremely frustrating Im worried that Ill never find a replacement roommate and I wont get to start looking for a place with my boyfriend until after the baby is born which really sucks I need him around right now but its hard because we live and work so far away from eachother We used to live closer to each other but he was in a really bad car accident last year that completely flipped his life upside down so he moved back with his parents to start over  I work at a museum and the hours and schedule are very grueling I feel like I dont have time to do anything I needwant to do Im new at this job  months in and I havent shared my news with them so sometimes I dont feel well and I cant explain why I contacted our HR and I know Im only going to get  weeks unpaid leave off which is definitely not enough At one point I had two jobs but the second one was really hard on my body and it was advised to me to quit When I have a day off all I do is sleep I used to live my job and I love working hard but I almost despise everyday now when I wake up Some of my other friends want to make plans and hangout but Im just too tired and I just want to save money if I can I feel bad that I dont have the energy to be as good of a friend right now  Im lucky to have a lot of family support I have a therapist and she is very helpful but I still feel so miserable and hopeless Im trying not to beat myself up about what I shouldve done better I feel guilty and sad that I am just not enjoying this my first pregnancy I feel guilty that maybe Im not being grateful enough My baby is healthy Im healthy My boyfriend loves me to death He wants to get married and its something we always discussed before but it feels like just another thing to worry about right now and I feel bad that were not already married and that Im too tired to think about that right now I dont feel ready for this baby and I dont feel like I have time to get ready There are  things to do at any given time I am a person who plans everything out and this pregnancy was a surprise and has really changed my life and ability to plan the things I wouldve wanted to I guess I want to be happy before the pregnancy is over and I spent the whole time worrying and not enjoying it I want to be able to see my boyfriend more often We are west African and we have a few traditional babypregnancy events we need to plan and Im too tired to even start but I want my baby to have that and the pictures like we did Im just really really sad and very scared and just exhausted I think I probably need to tell my doctor or my therapist soon that Im really not okay and I need more help I am struggling Thanks for reading all of this if you did

So I am looking for some stories about what people decided to do when their mom said  they wanted to stay after baby Tldr My out of town mom REALLY wants to stay after we have our baby we have a super small house and my partner works from home in the area she would sleep in She wont stop bringing it up Long version One of the first things my mom said after I told her I was pregnant was that she wanted to come stay and help with cooking and cleaning and the baby after we have them  Let me say I love my mom and we have a good relationship But I also get annoyed at my parents VERY easily and that would probably be amplified after giving birth  But not only that is we have a very small s bungalow When we found out we were having a baby my partner moved his office from the second bedroom upstairs to downstairsto our finished basement in the living room area down there Our bedroom is VERY short on closet space so he also loved his dresser and shirts to the spare bedroom downstairs as well it was also in the second bedroom before So my partners things are now all in the spare bedroom and he will need to work from the basement after taking a few weeks off for baby of course I have explained that our house is REALLY not set up for having any extra people stay now to my mom about ten times She keeps saying things like when I come to stay Or you know I would just keep to myself when I come stay Every time we talk  One solution I did offer was that she come and stay with my partners parents who have a HUGE house and live a  minute drive from us They have offered But she has it in her head that this is some right of passage for a mother to come and move in  despite me asking every friend I have with a baby and hearing that no one had a parent essentially move in Also Im sorry but if shes paying  for a plane ticket why not just buy us a meal service and housekeeping visit and come in a few months when we are more settled and the baby is more fun too Did you have a parent come and stay after baby Why Why not

Hi all I am  weeks today and working on my baby shower guest list My mother is technically hosting aka paying although I have done most of the planning myself My family are immigrants which means my parents have a tightknit support system that they have developed over the last  years here in the US They are all ride or dies for my parents would give them or me their last dollar Can you see where this is going My sweet  had  guests  of which were my friends My bridal shower had  guests  of which were my friends and my inlaws My baby shower  guests  of which are my friends I cant tell my mother that I havent seen or spoken to most of her invitees especially her friends since my bridal shower  years ago It doesnt matter They supposedly love me theyve been to all of my major milestone parties and thats why theyre all invited to this one I feel ungrateful just typing this but it is exhausting to think about all these people who I hardly know touching my belly and giving me unsolicited advice rant edit for clarity My issue is that mom is throwing herself a party full of her friends under the guise of throwing me a baby shower Just like she did for my bridal shower and sweet  For more detail see my comment response

We are looking to go on our Babymoon in the second half of April or first week of May We just got back from Mexico and want to stay in the US once Im further along also travel to FL will be shorter Ill be  weeks Im just looking for a nice hotel with good pool and beach A bonus would be a quiet pool or adults only pool Other than staying at the hotel we will just want to enjoy nice dinners out Considering the keys Miami Fort Lauderdale etc but open to any locations that delta flies into Thanks for any ideas

This has just been weighing on me for a couple of months now and is really eating me up Im  weeks along and I noticed over the past few months that he is totally uninterested in having any sort of sexual contact with me Hes still very loving affectionate kind and everything else But he is absolutely not into anything else Our sex life before was active and amazing but now Im just feeling totally rejected and ugly My libido has not dropped at all I still feel up for sex He has assured me that he still loves me and is attracted to me but hasnt given any solid answers to why this is happening It all just feels like excuses to me The excuses being he doesnt want to disappoint me sexually He feels pressured to preform Stress It just all feels like BS Because where was this pressure to preform when I got pregnant I absolutely understand that he may be having less desire to have sex with me because of my pregnancy He may be worried about hurting the baby blah blah blah And I know its his right to not be overly attracted to me right now But I dont feel like I have accept that for myself The thing is it makes me have less attraction for him I dont tend to feel that much desire for someone who obviously doesnt desire me the same This has hurt me on an extremely deep level and right now I am having difficulties seeing myself every being sexual with him again because of this The hurt and rejection this has made me feel has turned me off It makes me trust him less in a way Like over time Ill physically change with age And now I cant trust that he will feel the same for me because of how hes handling this  I just see posts of women saying theyre totally fine with their partners not being into them right now and that they understand Thats great for them but I cant seem to make myself accept it Hes allowed to have his own feelings and preferences regarding his attraction to me but I feel like Im allowed that same right A friend of mine said itll get better and back to normal when the pregnancy is over but I feel like thats just a way of telling me to suck it up and deal with it I dont want a partner who cant accept me and desire me right now I dont feel like I can move on from that because Ill always think about it Again my boyfriend is amazing Hes still the best but I cant put this behind me My attraction for him is waning and I dont think Ill be able to get it back Ill always remember how this made me feel I cant accept it  Also this isnt my first pregnancy Its just my first pregnancy with him And yes I have expressed this to him I dont know I just feel incredibly sad about this and Ive been crying every day in the bathroom at work because of it

I love my wife I love our little dolphin that is about to come to this world in May and would do anything to make them happy and comfortable Weve been married for  years and been together  and we both respect each others parents and have a good relationship with them We have no close family around us Her parents have applied to get visas but there is a huge backlog and wait time for citizens of that country to get US visas My parents however dont need any visas and can come and go whenever they want and obviously also want to come and see us My wife always had dreams of having her mom by her side during and after labor but with only  months left weve almost lost hope and as you can imagine shes pretty devastated She has a history of depression and even though that shes come a long way and is doing much better now Im really worried that it might all come back postpartum She is still seeing her therapist and I know this is one of the main topics they talk about My wife has told me that if her mom cant get a visa and be by her side during labor she doesnt want my mom to be there either because shell be reminded that her mom isnt and she would rather just the two of us doing it all alone I completely understand this yet I know that we could use every bit of help possible and I would rather have a close relative helping us than hiring a nurse or a nanny However after being together for this long I think Ive finally learned when to respect my wifes wish and stand up for her I was talking with my mom last night and she jokingly said you have the guest bedroom ready right Im looking at the tickets right now I told her that whats the rush we still have lots of time and also maybe we just want to do it alone and not bother anyone She said imagine me not being there for the birth of my first grandchild That was it and we switched the subject afterwards So Im stuck here not knowing what to do I want to tell my mom not to come yet I know no matter how and what I tell her shell never understand and will take it pretty bad but I want to respect and support my wifes wish I guess Im looking for advice here on how I should approach my mom and tell her that maybe its better if she waits couple of months after birth

For the past three or four months weve been dealing with harassment from our neighbors with no idea why been to the police and the landlord to try to mediate or just stop it all together Im now almost  weeks and when coming home from work my husband was cornered by one of our neighbors This man told him that we had to either move or move the baby At least now we know why theyve been harassing us we want to the police station again asking for a no contact order but the police havent done anything My husband is now so nervous about me being home alone while hes at work he almost called out and has called the station twice to follow up      We start moving on the first I cant wait to be out of here oh yes and the landlord whos done nothing to help us has listed our apartment for  which is  more then we pay now which to me is a little sus

Im pretty sure its just baby fever but Im desperate for a child now Ive been in adult work in my life and moved on Im at the age where having a child is ideal for me  Ive been single for a while and Ive tried to keep it that way but Im desperate for a relationship and a child To all people pregnant or have been what pushed you over the line in being  sure you wanted to be a mother

I have taken  tests and all of them have said positive I was not expecting this at all and Im extremely overwhelmed Looking for advice on what I should do at this point since this would be my first pregnancy and I have little to no experience with pregnancy having never been around pregnant women

Long post incoming that may be triggering My wife and I lost our baby at  weeks on  and Im still reeling and searching for answers on what we or the doctors could have done differently We got pregnant naturally back in October after having our first baby through IVF Pregnancy was going smoothly but in our first ultrasound they mentioned they saw a subchorionic hematoma Cant remember if they said it was small or not but they werent overly concerned said they normally resolve Around week  my wife started bleeding It was bright red and we were very scared We called the drs office and got in for an ultrasound that day They said the baby was healthy and fine that it was probably her SCH  Over the next  weeks the bleeding continued It would get better and get worse Sometimes it was red and heavier and sometimes it was lighter and brown she passed small clots here and there My wife went on modified bedrest because she was scared of the bleeding thinking she was going to lose the baby It was hard for her since shes normally very active and we have a toddler but she did a good job with it We called the drs office several times during this and went in for I believe  appointments where they did bedside ultrasounds but told us the baby was healthy each time The last ultrasound they measured her cervix I believe it was cm On  the bleeding picked up a bit and my wife said she may have been feeling some cramps it was a Saturday so we went to the ER They did an ultrasound there and examined her cervix and once again told us everything looked fine My wife passed a clot that night so we thought that may have been the cause On  my wife was still bleeding and said she may have been experiencing some cramping again She called the dr and the they said based on what they heard from the ER dr they werent overly concerned We have an ultrasound scheduled for the next day so we would check it out then My wife called me at work a little later that day and said she thought her cramps were getting worse and asked me to come home But the time I got there she was in quite a bit of pain and bleeding a decent amount so we went back to the ER At this point my wife is in more pain than Ive ever seen her basically to the point of screaming They took us up to labor and delivery and had the on call dr come in They did an ultrasound again and the baby still seemed healthy The on call dr came in and examined her cervix They told us the cervix had shortened and the baby was right up against it and was coming I asked if there was anything we could do to stop it and they said no  Our actual dr came in a little later and did another ultrasound She said the placenta had a full abruption and the baby no longer had a heartbeat Assuming this was caused by the SCH My wife birthed him a few hours later Our dr kept saying that no one could have seen this coming and we wouldnt probably not have a definitive answer on what happened But I feel like with all the bleeding and all of the calls to the dr maybe we could have Looking to see if anyone here had similar experiences with better outcomes or is a medical professional Thanks Update thank you all for the responses and thoughtful words I had no idea how many other people had gone through the same ordeal which is so sad but also somewhat comforting that we are not alone I feel for you all Also good to know that there really wasnt much we or the doctors could have done

eachother and thats been very hard We want to move in together but I have an apartment with a roommate we dont get along and thats another stress of mine because we were good friends and Im having trouble finding a replacement roommate Im back home with my parents to get awaya break from my roommate as she really really hurt me A few times I feel like I cant move on with anything else until I can get out of my apartment situation Im trying not to beat myself up about it because I had a gut feeling that I shouldnt have moved with this person but I ignored it I wasnt ready to move anyway I just didnt want to inconvenience my friend because I already agreed to it months earlier Most of my money goes towards that apartment and I HATE being there so now I commute to work from my parents house more often which is extremely frustrating Im worried that Ill never find a replacement roommate and I wont get to start looking for a place with my boyfriend until after the baby is born which really sucks I need him around right now but its hard because we live and work so far away from eachother We used to live closer to each other but he was in a really bad car accident last year that completely flipped his life upside down so he moved back with his parents to start over  I work at a museum and the hours and schedule are very grueling I feel like I dont have time to do anything I leave off which is definitely not enough At one point I had two jobs but the second one was really hard on my body and it was advised to me to quit When I have a day off all I do is sleep I used to live my job and I love working hard but I almost despise everyday now when I wake up Some of my other friends want to make plans and hangout but Im just too tired and I just want to save money if I can I feel bad that I dont have the energy to be as good of a friend right now  Im lucky to have a lot of family support I have a therapist and she is very helpful but I still feel so miserable and hopeless Im trying not to beat myself up about what I shouldve done better I feel guilty and sad that I am just not enjoying this my first pregnancy I feel guilty that maybe Im not being grateful and I feel bad that were not already married and that Im too tired to think about that right now I dont feel ready for this baby and I dont feel like I have time to get ready There are  things to do events we need to plan and Im too tired to even start but I want my baby to have that and the pictures like we did Im just really really sad and very scared and just exhausted I think I probably need to tell my doctor or my therapist soon that Im really not okay and I need more help I am struggling Thanks for reading all of this if you did

house more often which is extremely frustrating Im worried that Ill never find a replacement roommate and I wont get to start looking for a place with my boyfriend until after the baby is born which really sucks I need him around right now but its hard because we live and work so far away from eachother We used to live closer to each other but he was in a really bad car accident last year that live my job and I love working hard but I almost despise everyday now when I wake up Some of my other friends want to make plans and hangout but Im just too tired and I just want to save money if I and I feel bad that were not already married and that Im too tired to think about that right now I dont feel ready for this baby and I dont feel like I have time to get ready There are  things to do
